remarks: The converse of a class abstraction of nested ordered pairs. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Aug-2017.)
statement:
cnvoprab.x $e |- F/ x ps $.
cnvoprab.y $e |- F/ y ps $.
cnvoprab.1 $e |- ( a = <. x , y >. -> ( ps <-> ph ) ) $.
cnvoprab.2 $e |- ( ps -> a e. ( _V X. _V ) ) $.
cnvoprab $p |- `' { <. <. x , y >. , z >. | ph } = { <. z , a >. | ps } $.
$d a ph $.
$d a x y z $.
